message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $12500 for it. Can you consider this offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $13750. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.
